name: tree-model
description: Manipulate and traverse tree-like structures in javascript.
author: Jo√£o Nuno Silva <jnss81@gmail.com> (http://jnuno.com)

scripts.lint: jshint index.js test/test.js && eslint index.js test/test.js && npm run dtslint
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run lint && npm run dist && git add dist/TreeModel*.js
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && echo 'Dont forget to publish to npm...'
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && browserify index.js -o dist/TreeModel.js -s TreeModel && uglifyjs dist/TreeModel.js > dist/TreeModel-min.js
